feed.subtitle: OK Boomer, all the latest TikToks from ngkoksongofficial

entry.title: Meditation helped me and my late wife when she was dying of cancer to stay calm and peaceful in the face of extreme stress. While undergoing treatment, she remained cheerful in her final days. Our 15 year practice of meditation prepared us to be at peace
entry.content: Meditation helped me and my late wife when she was dying of cancer to stay calm and peaceful in the face of extreme stress. While undergoing treatment, she remained cheerful in her final days. Our 15 year practice of meditation prepared us to be at peace in the face of difficulty and extreme adversity. After her passing, meditation helped me cope with my sadness. #mentalhealth #peace #lifelessons #cancer #cancerawareness

entry.title: Sybil made us one of her childhood favourites today — Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich! Even though I told her the taste was ‘ok’, I was smiling widely. I am blessed to be able to share these moments with her. This is a reminder to tell your loved ones you a
entry.content: Sybil made us one of her childhood favourites today — Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich! Even though I told her the taste was ‘ok’, I was smiling widely. I am blessed to be able to share these moments with her. This is a reminder to tell your loved ones you appreciate them ❤️ #breakfast #family #couplegoals #couple #peanutbutter

entry.title: Last week I met some of my young friends, I listened as they shared their views on what common stressors and causes of anxiety are today. I shared my idea for a short meditation series and they encouraged me to start filming. Please stay tuned! #mentalhea
entry.content: Last week I met some of my young friends, I listened as they shared their views on what common stressors and causes of anxiety are today. I shared my idea for a short meditation series and they encouraged me to start filming. Please stay tuned! #mentalhealth #motivation #lifehacks #peace #mentalhealthmatters

entry.title: Today I started to record my meditation series. Meditation has helped me tremendously in my life. Looking forward to share this life skill with all of you! #mentalhealth #meditation #mentalhealthmatters #lifehacks #lifetips
entry.content: Today I started to record my meditation series. Meditation has helped me tremendously in my life. Looking forward to share this life skill with all of you! #mentalhealth #meditation #mentalhealthmatters #lifehacks #lifetips

entry.title: Savouring the lunch Sybil made today for the family. She used lots of hearty ingredients and my heart was definitely full. Even though we’re busy all the time, we make it a point to spend Sundays having a meal together. ❤️ What are you having for lunch to
entry.content: Savouring the lunch Sybil made today for the family. She used lots of hearty ingredients and my heart was definitely full. Even though we’re busy all the time, we make it a point to spend Sundays having a meal together. ❤️ What are you having for lunch today?

entry.title: I shared my secret to staying healthy at 75, ‘SHIELD’. This acronym was coined by Dr Rudolph Tanzi who specialises in Alzheimer’s and neurology. It is heartening that so many of you guys have picked up on my version of it and helped spread this life-savin
entry.content: I shared my secret to staying healthy at 75, ‘SHIELD’. This acronym was coined by Dr Rudolph Tanzi who specialises in Alzheimer’s and neurology. It is heartening that so many of you guys have picked up on my version of it and helped spread this life-saving message. When I came to know that Dr. Rudolph Tanzi is on the Scientific Board for Chromadex, it stimulated my interest in his work. He has been a leader in Alzheimer’s research for decades . I started reading up on some of his books , “The Super Brain” and “The Healing Self”, where I came across the wonderful acronym Dr. Tanzi used for healthy lifestyle especially when one is aging - S.H.I.E.L.D. When I had the opportunity to speak with Dr. Tanzi via zoom, I wanted to know how he came up with his acronym. Here is a sneak peek of the conversation. I hope that we continue to spread positive messages like this, so that we can keep the online space a truly beneficial one for all ❤️

entry.title: Max and I would like to wish you a very good morning and a cheerful start to your day! What are your weekend plans? #britishshorthair #mentalhealthmatters #peace #motivation #morningroutine
entry.content: Max and I would like to wish you a very good morning and a cheerful start to your day! What are your weekend plans? #britishshorthair #mentalhealthmatters #peace #motivation #morningroutine

entry.title: Sybil baked me some oatmeal /flax seed/wheat germ sugar free cookies. They tasted ‘interesting’ but I savoured every bit of it because it was handmade with time and love. ❤️ #healthy #couplegoals #family #breakfast
entry.content: Sybil baked me some oatmeal /flax seed/wheat germ sugar free cookies. They tasted ‘interesting’ but I savoured every bit of it because it was handmade with time and love. ❤️ #healthy #couplegoals #family #breakfast

entry.title: Very delighted last night that President Tharman and I came together to celebrate the 20th anniversary of Wealth Management Institute which I helped to set up in 2003.
entry.content: Very delighted last night that President Tharman and I came together to celebrate the 20th anniversary of Wealth Management Institute which I helped to set up in 2003.

entry.title: It takes time to trust someone enough to be comfortable. Papa and I don’t get to spend a lot of time together, but when we do it’s happiness . Happy Deepavali from our family to yours ❤️ — Max #family #deepavali #holidays #britishshorthair #catsoftiktok
entry.content: It takes time to trust someone enough to be comfortable. Papa and I don’t get to spend a lot of time together, but when we do it’s happiness . Happy Deepavali from our family to yours ❤️ — Max #family #deepavali #holidays #britishshorthair #catsoftiktok
